thread.title: First Han Solo cast photo is shared | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: First Han Solo cast photo is shared | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.Com
title: First Han Solo cast photo is shared | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Filming of the Han Solo prequel is underway. And on Tuesday the first cast shot was shared by Disney with the caption: 'Han Solo - Smuggler. Scoundrel. Hero. A new Star Wars Story begins.' The image was taken aboard the Millennium Falcon. Star Alden Ehrenreich, who is playing the younger version of the roguish character made famous by Harrison Ford, is seen alongside his fellow actors and the film's two directors. New: Filming of the Han Solo prequel movie is underway. And on Tuesday the first cast shot was shared by Disney with the caption: 'Han Solo - Smuggler. Scoundrel. Hero. A new Star Wars Story begins' Old: The spinoff takes place before the events of 1977's Star Wars: A New Hope. Here (L to R) is Harrison Ford as Han Solo, Carrie Fisher as Princess Leia and Mark Hamill as Luke Skywalker A good match: Ford on the left in A New Hope and Ehrenreich on the right in the new image Also in the image with Ehrenreich is Donald Glover, who will play a young Lando Calrissian. That character was first played by Billy Dee Williams in The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Joonas Suotamo is in his Chewbacca suit. He doubled as the Wookie in Star War: The Force Awakens. Emilia Clarke, who wears a grey top and is leaning on Alden, is also seen. Older Han: Ford as Solo alongside Chewbacca in the Falcon in 2015's The Force Awakens Woody Harrelson, who is believed to be playing Han's mentor, is pictured on the left in a blue hoodie. And British actress Phoebe Waller-Bridge, 31, is seen in the background. Directors Phil Lord and Christopher Miller are also in the frame. Not pictured is Thandie Newton, who also has a role. This year: Before the Han Solo spinoff comes out, Star Wars: The Last Jedi will be released. That sequel is slated for December 15, 2017 with Daisy Ridley, John Boyega and the late Carrie Fisher 'The movie will explore the duo's adventures before the events of Star Wars: A New Hope, including their early encounters with that other card-playing rogue from a galaxy far, far away, Lando Calrissian,' a statement on the film's website reads. The 'duo' likely refers to Han and Chewbacca. 'Watching such inspired people from all over the world, with such unique voices, come together for the sole purpose of making art, is nothing short of miraculous,' the directors said in a statement. 'We canâ€™t think of anything funny to say, because we just feel really moved, and really lucky.' A massive hit: Last Jedi picks up immediately after the closing shot of The Force Awakens Filming officially began Monday at Pinewood Studios in London. The untitled film hits theaters May 25, 2018. The spinoff takes place before the events of 1977's Star Wars: A New Hope. Before the Han Solo spinoff comes out, Star Wars: The Last Jedi will be released. That sequel is slated for December 15, 2017 and stars Daisy Ridley, John Boyega and the late Carrie Fisher. Last Jedi picks up immediately after the closing shot of The Force Awakens. The first Star Wars spinoff from Disney was 2016's Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Share or comment on this article 5
